content: this crochet trivet pattern is one of the fastest and easiest projects ever it is crocheted with a size 6 yarn and super simple stitches the simplicity gives it a classic modern look that will fit right into anyone s kitchen please note that an ad-free pdf version of this pattern can be purchased in my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/crochet-trivet-pattern/ materials -yarn bee cotton knit weight 6 super bulky 100% cotton 7oz/200g 42yds/38m almond and elm 1 skein approx 14 5 yds used -us s/ 19 mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch marker finished size approx 7 in diameter abbreviation key chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet st stitch * * repeat instructions between asterisks as many times as directed
